message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $14,000. It's a great deal for you, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Bob, I appreciate your interest! While $11,000 is tempting, I'm still looking for a price closer to $13,000.  This would be a fair compromise, wouldn't you agree?
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'm willing to meet you halfway at $12,500. Would you be willing to accept that price?
